inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: valid sanitary card in our public health system

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive HCV antibody test without RNA result or positive result without treatment or confirmed sustained virological response

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: tested more than one year ago

exclusion.criterion: previous DBS testing at DAC lost to follow-up
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of previous DBS testing at DAC lost to follow-up

notes: Patient has HCV and HBV coinfection, but no other significant medical history. He is on treatment for the past 6 months.
